item.title: Uta no Prince-sama: Dolce Vita teaser trailer
item.content:encoded:
• Switch

Further updates to follow.

Broccoli has released a teaser trailer for Uta no Prince-sama: Dolce Vita, the 2016-announced new entry in the series, which was originally in development for PS Vita before being moved to Switch in 2019.

According to the trailer, Uta no Prince-sama: Dolce Vita is currently in deep development, with further updates to be announced at a later date.

Watch the teaser trailer below.

Teaser Trailer

item.title: Ketsu Battler adds Beelzebub from Granblue Fantasy Versus: Rising on January 18
item.content:encoded:
• Switch

The wings of chaos with a glorious butt.

Ketsu Battler, the one-on-one butt shaking fighting game, will add Beelzebub from Granblue Fantasy Versus: Rising as a free guest character on January 18, developer KAYAC announced.

Ketsu Battler is available now for Switch in Japan.

Watch a new trailer below.

Granblue Fantasy Versus: Rising Collaboration Trailer



https://www.gematsu.com/2026/01/ketsu-battler-adds-beelzebub-from-granblue-fantasy-versus-rising-on-january-18

item.title: Pathologic 3 now available for PS5, PC; Xbox Series version launches January 23
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • PS5
  • Xbox Series

Xbox Series version due out at a later date.

The PlayStation 5 version of survival horror game Pathologic 3 is now available via PlayStation Store alongside its previously planned PC (Steam) release, publisher HypeTrain Digital and developer Ice-Pick Lodge announced. The PlayStation 5 version was originally scheduled to launch at a later date alongside Xbox Series. The Xbox Series version will launch on January 23.

Here is an overview of the game, via HypeTrain Digital:

About the Game

Pathologic 3 continues the cult series about a mysterious plague in a distant steppe city. It’s a psychological detective story: you play as Daniil Dankovsky, a metropolitan physician who arrives to meet an “immortal” man, but is forced to lead the fight against the epidemic and try to save the city in just 12 days.

In this psychological horror game, you are a doctor with only 12 days to save a town from a mysterious plague. Make ruthless decisions and diagnose with precision. Shape the town’s future and rewrite the past. Hold yourself together while it all falls apart.

Demo

Daniil Dankovsky, the Bachelor, arrives in the City-on-Gorkhon. He wants to meet an immortal man. See you at the point of arrival. We’ll be waiting on the platform to help with his luggage.

  • A new introduction to the full game—entirely unique content we haven’t shown anywhere before.
  • Town-on-Gorkhon: explore the streets and the city’s “impossible” architecture.
  • Memorable characters and meaningful choices: you decide who to save.
  • You are a Doctor in search of truth: examine and question patients to spot lies and make accurate diagnoses.
  • Fieldwork: comb through homes and districts to unravel the city’s mysteries.
  • Localizations: English, Russian, Brazilian Portuguese, German, and Italian are available now.
  • Full controller support! (Beta option.)

Watch a new trailer below.

Launch Trailer



https://www.gematsu.com/2026/01/pathologic-3-now-available-for-ps5-pc-xbox-series-version-launches-january-23
